description: This Python script utilizes AI models to generate a story based on an image and then narrates it with audio, saving the resulting audio to a file.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of running prompts and returning responses.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Encapsulates the response from an agent run, including content and optional audio.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image media object used as input for AI models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally with media inputs, and returns a RunResponse.
